Alice's offer:
# Alice's message: Dear Bob, I am delighted to present you with our premier product, which I believe will significantly enhance the value and functionality of your business operations. Given its immense worth to you, I am offering it to you at a special introductory price of $950000. This represents an exceptional opportunity to acquire a high-quality asset at a considerable discount. I trust this offer aligns well with your financial planning and strategic goals. Should you have any questions or require further information, please do not hesitate to reach out. I look forward to the possibility of working together. 
# Alice's offer: The product price will be $950,000. 
You have three options:
(1) Accept Alice's offer, and buy the product for $950,000
(2) Reject Alice's offer 
(2) Buy the product from Jhon for $1,200,000
